title: Power of Integer
text:
For a given positive integery(y> 1), if we can find a largest integer k and a smallest positive integerx, such thatx^k=y, then the power ofyis regarded ask.Calculate the sum of the power of the integers from a to b. (2<=a<=b<=1018)InputThe input consists of multiple test cases.For each test case, there is one line containing two integersaandb.End of input is indicated by a line containing two zeros.OutputFor each test case, output the sum of the power of the integers fromatob.ExampleInput:2 10
248832 248832
0 0Output:13
5
